europeana:record.dc:title: Phaeocroides Nanus (Arrow), Phaeocroides Mapellii Petrovitz and Phaeocroides Orientalis (Petrovitz): notes on Generic status, synonymy and types; redescriptions (Coleoptera: Hybosoridae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Kuijten P.J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Coleoptera; Hybosoridae; Phaeocroides; Phaeochrous; India; generic status; synonymy; types
europeana:record.dc:description: Phaeochrous nanus Arrow is transferred to Phaeocroides (comb. nov.); Phaeocroides mapellii Petrovitz is a synonym (syn. nov.). Commentaries on the types and spelling of the generic name, differences from the other Indian genera and redescriptions are given.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Phaeocroides Nanus (Arrow), Phaeocroides Mapellii Petrovitz and Phaeocroides Orientalis (Petrovitz): notes on Generic status, synonymy and types; redescriptions (Coleoptera: Hybosoridae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 62) (Issue 7)
